about.intro: Founded in 2016 with 25 years of precision machining experience, Turnes Makina has quickly become a trusted, dynamic and innovative company.
about.body: Specialized in machining, we provide the highest quality products at competitive prices thanks to our material processing and quality expertise. We also fully meet customer needs in related processes such as cold/hot forging, press and laser forming, coating and heat treatment.
